            Welcome!
            I am a researcher specializing in Canadian, politival
            behaviour, and comparative politics at Western University,
            Canada. My research primarily centers on public opinion,
            partisanship and electoral behaviour, and I actively
            collaborate with scholars from various disciplines,
            including political psychology and sociology. My
            publications include observational methods (e.g., using
            cross-sectional and panel data) and survey
            experiments.
            My work has been featured in Opinião Pública and
            Electoral Studies.
